mapper.select: SELECT BASE_CD AS "code", BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE CL_CD = #{code_group} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD
SELECT CNSTW_CD AS "code", CNSTW_NM AS "value" FROM TWMS.TWN_CNSTW_PCE_MST WHERE CNSTW_PCE_G_CD = #{codeGroup} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CNSTW_CD
SELECT CODEVALUE AS "code", CODENAME AS "value" FROM TOMS.V_CODE WHERE UPPER_CODE = #{uppdrCd} ORDER BY CODETABLE_SEQ

SELECT '' AS "code", '-----선택-----' AS "value" FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BASE_CD AS CODE, BASE_CD_NM AS VALUE FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE SUPI_CL_CD = '267' /**P*/ AND SUPI_BASE_CD = '001' /**P*/ AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD)

SELECT '' AS "code", '-----선택-----' AS "value" FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BASE_CD AS CODE, BASE_CD_NM AS VALUE FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE SUPI_CL_CD = '267' /**P*/ AND SUPI_BASE_CD = '002' /**P*/ AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD)

SELECT A.BASE_CD AS "code" , A.BASE_CD_NM AS "value" , A.CL_CD AS CL FROM NGPS.TGC_BASE_CD A WHERE CL_CD = #{code} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.BASE_CD_NM IN ( SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(B.CND_STRT_SCP_VAL) AS CODE FROM ( SELECT A.MDL_CD , C.MTRL_CD , F_MTRL_NM(C.MTRL_CD) FROM TWB_MDL_MST A , TWB_MDL_MTRLCL_LIKG B , TWB_MTRLCL_PROD C WHERE A.MDL_CD = #{mdlCd} AND A.MDL_CD = B.MDL_CD AND B.MDL_CD = C.MDL_CD AND B.RAIL_NO = C.RAIL_NO AND B.MTRLCL_SN = C.MTRLCL_SN AND DECODE(B.BSMF_FP_SCN_CD, '01', 1, '02',2, '03', 2, 0) = ( SELECT CASE WHEN SF = 2 THEN 2 WHEN BF = 1 THEN 1 END AS BSMF_FP_SCN_CD FROM (SELECT MAX(DECODE(B.BSMF_FP_SCN_CD, '01', 1)) AS BF , MAX(DECODE(B.BSMF_FP_SCN_CD, '02', 2, '03', 2)) AS SF FROM TWB_MDL_MST A, TWB_MDL_MTRLCL_LIKG B, TWB_MTRLCL_PROD C WHERE A.MDL_CD = #{mdlCd} AND A.MDL_CD = B.MDL_CD AND B.MDL_CD = C.MDL_CD AND B.RAIL_NO = C.RAIL_NO AND B.MTRLCL_SN = C.MTRLCL_SN ) ) GROUP BY A.MDL_CD, C.MTRL_CD ORDER BY A.MDL_CD, F_MTRL_NM(C.MTRL_CD) ) A , ( SELECT B.MTRL_CD AS MTRL_CD -- 자재코드 , F_MTRL_NM(B.MTRL_CD) AS MTRL_NM -- 자재코드명 , B.CND_STRT_SCP_VAL AS CND_STRT_SCP_VAL -- 조건FROM , B.CND_FNH_SCP_VAL AS CND_FNH_SCP_VAL -- 조건TO FROM ( SELECT B.MTRL_CD -- 자재코드 FROM ( SELECT MTRLCL_CD FROM TWB_RIFA_CND_MST WHERE F_GET_CODE_NM(MTRLCL_CD,'65') LIKE 'GB%' GROUP BY MTRLCL_CD ) A , TWB_RIFA_CND_MST B WHERE B.SCP_CRTN_VAL_CD = '03' -- 범위준값코드(유리두께) AND F_GET_CODE_NM(B.MTRLCL_CD,'65') LIKE 'GB%' -- 20101220 박은영, '열 정의 애매' 오류로 MTRLCL_CD에 B.명시. - 확인 필요 GROUP BY B.MTRL_CD ORDER BY B.MTRL_CD ) A , TWB_RIFA_CND_MST B WHERE A.MTRL_CD = B.MTRL_CD ) B WHERE A.MTRL_CD = B.MTRL_CD (+) AND B.CND_FNH_SCP_VAL IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.MDL_CD, B.MTRL_NM, B.CND_STRT_SCP_VAL, B.CND_FNH_SCP_VAL )
ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, BASE_CD
SELECT BASE_CD AS "code", ETC_VAL_1 AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE CL_CD = #{code_group} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD
SELECT ETC_VAL_1 AS "code", BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE CL_CD = #{code_group} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD

select.if: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BASE_CD AS "code", BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE SUPI_CL_CD = #{supiClCd} AND SUPI_BASE_CD = #{supiBaseCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD)
SELECT BASE_CD AS "code", BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE SUPI_CL_CD = #{supiClCd} AND SUPI_BASE_CD = #{supiBaseCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD

mapper.select: SELECT BASE_CD AS "code" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE CL_CD = #{code_group} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD

-- searchAllBaseHCS1
SELECT CL_CD AS "clCd", --분류코드 BASE_CD AS "baseCd", --기초코드 BASE_CD_NM AS "baseCdNm", --기초코드명 SUPI_CL_CD AS "supiClCd", --상위분류코드 SUPI_BASE_CD AS "supiBaseCd", --상위기초코드 ETC_VAL_1 AS "etcVal1", --기타값1 ETC_VAL_2 AS "etcVal2", --기타값2 ETC_VAL_3 AS "etcVal3", --기타값3 REM_SBC AS "remSbc", --비고내용 IQ_SEQ AS "iqSeq", --조회순번 AFFR_SCN AS "affrScn", --완성창 업무구분 BASE_CD AS "code", BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE CL_CD = #{hClCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND BASE_CD IN ( SELECT DISTINCT firstCode FROM ( SELECT C.* , DECODE( CL_CD , #{hClCd} , BASE_CD , #{mClCd} , SUPI_BASE_CD , #{bClCd} , REPLACE(C.ETC_VAL_2 , '-'||SUPI_BASE_CD||'-'||BASE_CD , '') ) AS firstCode FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD C , TWB_MDL_LINK_MTRL_GRP A WHERE C.CL_CD IN (#{hClCd},#{mClCd},#{bClCd}) AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.ETC_VAL_1 = 0 AND A.MDL_CD = #{mdlCd} AND A.MTRL_GRP = #{mtglGrp} -- 01.핸들 , 02.크리센트, 03.스크린 AND A.MTRL_LINK = C.BASE_CD ) WHERE firstCode IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD

-- searchAllBaseHCS2
SELECT CL_CD AS "clCd", --분류코드 BASE_CD AS "baseCd", --기초코드 BASE_CD_NM AS "baseCdNm", --기초코드명 SUPI_CL_CD AS "supiClCd", --상위분류코드 SUPI_BASE_CD AS "supiBaseCd", --상위기초코드 ETC_VAL_1 AS "etcVal1", --기타값1 ETC_VAL_2 AS "etcVal2", --기타값2 ETC_VAL_3 AS "etcVal3", --기타값3 REM_SBC AS "remSbc", --비고내용 IQ_SEQ AS "iqSeq", --조회순번 AFFR_SCN AS "affrScn", --완성창 업무구분 BASE_CD AS "code", BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE CL_CD = #{mClCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND BASE_CD IN ( SELECT DISTINCT secondCode FROM ( SELECT C.* , DECODE( CL_CD , #{mClCd} , BASE_CD , #{bClCd} , SUPI_BASE_CD ) AS secondCode FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD C , TWB_MDL_LINK_MTRL_GRP A WHERE (( C.CL_CD = #{mClCd} AND SUPI_BASE_CD = #{supiBaseCd}) OR ( C.CL_CD = #{bClCd} AND REPLACE(C.ETC_VAL_2 , '-'||SUPI_BASE_CD||'-'||BASE_CD , '') = #{supiBaseCd} ) ) AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.ETC_VAL_1 = 0 AND A.MDL_CD = #{mdlCd} AND A.MTRL_GRP = #{mtglGrp} -- 01.핸들 , 02.크리센트, 03.스크린 AND A.MTRL_LINK = C.BASE_CD ) WHERE secondCode IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD

-- searchAllBaseHCS3
SELECT CL_CD AS "clCd", --분류코드 BASE_CD AS "baseCd", --기초코드 BASE_CD_NM AS "baseCdNm", --기초코드명 SUPI_CL_CD AS "supiClCd", --상위분류코드 SUPI_BASE_CD AS "supiBaseCd", --상위기초코드 ETC_VAL_1 AS "etcVal1", --기타값1 ETC_VAL_2 AS "etcVal2", --기타값2 ETC_VAL_3 AS "etcVal3", --기타값3 REM_SBC AS "remSbc", --비고내용 IQ_SEQ AS "iqSeq", --조회순번 AFFR_SCN AS "affrScn", --완성창 업무구분 BASE_CD AS "code", BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE CL_CD = #{bClCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND BASE_CD IN ( SELECT DISTINCT thirdCode FROM ( SELECT C.* , BASE_CD AS thirdCode FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD C , TWB_MDL_LINK_MTRL_GRP A WHERE C.CL_CD = #{bClCd} AND C.SUPI_BASE_CD = #{supiBaseCd} AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.ETC_VAL_1 = 0 AND A.MDL_CD = #{mdlCd} AND A.MTRL_GRP = #{mtglGrp} -- 01.핸들 , 02.크리센트, 03.스크린 AND A.MTRL_LINK = C.BASE_CD ) WHERE thirdCode IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD

-- 사업부 콤보조회 SELECT A.TSPAT_SPART AS "code" , '['||A.TSPAT_SPART||'] '||A.TSPAT_VTEXT AS "value" FROM TOPICS.TSPAT A , WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD B WHERE A.TSPAT_SPART = B.BASE_CD AND B.CL_CD = '464' ORDER BY A.TSPAT_SPART
-- 영업팀 콤보조회 SELECT TVKBT_VKBUR AS "code" , '['||TVKBT_VKBUR||'] '||TVKBT_BEZEI AS "value" FROM TOPICS.TVKBT WHERE NVL(NEWORG_YN, 'Y') = 'Y' AND TVKBT_SPART = #{tspat} ORDER BY TVKBT_VKBUR
-- 영업그룹 콤보조회 SELECT TVGRT_VKGRP AS "code" , '['||TVGRT_VKGRP||'] '||TVGRT_BEZEI AS "value" FROM TOPICS.TVGRT WHERE NVL(NEWORG_YN, 'Y') = 'Y' AND TVGRT_VKBUR = #{tvkbt} ORDER BY TVGRT_VKGRP

SELECT BASE_CD AS "code", BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE CL_CD = #{code_group}
AND BASE_CD NOT IN
'${notIn[index]}'
AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD

SELECT DISTINCT A.USER_ID AS "code" , B.SA_NAME||' '||B.SA_JOBX_NAME|| ' ('||B.SA_DEPT_NAME||', 0'||REPLACE(REPLACE(B.SA_PHONE_AREA, '82-', ''), '0', '')||'-'||B.SA_PHONE_O||')' AS "value" FROM TWC_CRGR_MST A , TWC_SSO_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.SA_USER AND A.AFFR_SCN_CD = '30' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'twms' AS "code" , 'WINS IT 지원 (02-6930-1395, 1396)'AS "value" FROM DUAL
ORDER BY "value"
SELECT BASE_CD AS "code", BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM WOASIS.TB_BASE_CD WHERE CL_CD = #{code_group} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND BASE_CD IN ('10', '20', '30', '90', '91') ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, CL_CD, BASE_CD

SELECT CSMR_CD AS "code" , CSMR_NM AS "value" FROM V_TWC_CSMR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND CSMR_CD NOT IN (SELECT COF_CD FROM TWO_COF_MST WHERE SCRN_IDCN_YN = 'N')
AND CSMR_SCN_CD IN
'${custType[index]}'
AND AGEN_CD = #{cofCd}
SELECT A.BASE_CD AS "code" , '['||A.BASE_CD||'] '||A.BASE_CD_NM AS "value" FROM NGPS.TGC_BASE_CD A WHERE CL_CD = #{code_group} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IQ_SEQ, BASE_CD
